### Literature Review Focus Areas for EduAsses

1. **Modern Educational Assessment Methods**
   - Comparison between traditional and online assessment
   - Effectiveness of different question types (multiple choice, essay, practical)
   - Impact of immediate feedback on learning outcomes

2. **Existing Online Assessment Systems**
   - Analysis of popular platforms (Kahoot, Quizizz, Google Forms)
   - Comparison of professional assessment solutions (ExamSoft, Respondus)
   - Market gaps that EduAsses addresses

3. **Automated Grading Algorithms**
   - Accuracy of automated grading methods
   - Techniques for grading short answers and matching questions
   - Challenges in grading open-ended questions

4. **Learning Analytics**
   - Key performance indicators in educational assessment
   - Using data to improve teaching and learning outcomes
   - Effective learning data visualization models

### 3.2. Assessment Creation and Management (Táº¡o vÃ  Quáº£n lÃ½ BÃ i Kiá»ƒm Tra)

- **Há»— trá»£ Äa dáº¡ng Loáº¡i CÃ¢u Há»i:**
  - **Thá»±c táº¿ EduAsses:** Há»‡ thá»‘ng há»— trá»£ Ä‘áº§y Ä‘á»§ 8 loáº¡i cÃ¢u há»i nhÆ° Ä‘Ã£ Ä‘á»‹nh nghÄ©a trong `prisma/schema.prisma` (enum `QuestionType`):

  - **Chi tiáº¿t triá»ƒn khai:** Má»—i loáº¡i cÃ¢u há»i cÃ³ cáº¥u trÃºc lÆ°u trá»¯ riÃªng trong `Question.metadata` (JSON) Ä‘á»ƒ chá»©a cÃ¡c thÃ´ng tin Ä‘áº·c thÃ¹ (vÃ­ dá»¥: `allowMultipleAnswers` cho tráº¯c nghiá»‡m, `caseSensitive` cho tráº£ lá»i ngáº¯n). - **Thiáº¿t káº¿ Giao diá»‡n Táº¡o BÃ i Kiá»ƒm Tra (UI/UX):**

    *   **Táº¡o má»›i bÃ i kiá»ƒm tra:** Má»™t form hoáº·c quy trÃ¬nh nhiá»u bÆ°á»›c (wizard) Ä‘á»ƒ nháº­p thÃ´ng tin cÆ¡ báº£n cá»§a bÃ i kiá»ƒm tra (model `Quiz`): `title`, `description`, `timeLimit`, `category`, `tags`, `startDate`, `endDate`, `maxAttempts`, `passingScore`, `shuffleQuestions`, `showResults`.
    *   **ThÃªm/Sá»­a/XÃ³a cÃ¢u há»i:** Giao diá»‡n trá»±c quan Ä‘á»ƒ thÃªm cÃ¡c cÃ¢u há»i thuá»™c 8 loáº¡i trÃªn vÃ o bÃ i kiá»ƒm tra. Má»—i cÃ¢u há»i (model `Question`) cÃ³ `content`, `type`, `points`, `order`, `explanation`, `mediaUrl`.
    *   **Quáº£n lÃ½ NgÃ¢n hÃ ng CÃ¢u há»i (`QuestionBank`):** GiÃ¡o viÃªn cÃ³ thá»ƒ táº¡o vÃ  quáº£n lÃ½ cÃ¡c ngÃ¢n hÃ ng cÃ¢u há»i, sau Ä‘Ã³ dá»… dÃ ng chá»n cÃ¢u há»i tá»« ngÃ¢n hÃ ng Ä‘á»ƒ thÃªm vÃ o bÃ i kiá»ƒm tra má»›i, giÃºp tÃ¡i sá»­ dá»¥ng ná»™i dung hiá»‡u quáº£.
  - **Chi tiáº¿t UI/UX:** Sá»­ dá»¥ng cÃ¡c component tá»« Shadcn UI (nhÆ° `Card`, `Button`, `Input`, `Select`, `Tabs`, `Dialog`) Ä‘á»ƒ táº¡o giao diá»‡n trá»±c quan, dá»… sá»­ dá»¥ng, tuÃ¢n thá»§ `Design-System-EduAccess.mdc`.

- **LÆ°u trá»¯ Cáº¥u trÃºc Äá» thi vÃ  Metadata:**

    *   Model `Question` lÆ°u chi tiáº¿t tá»«ng cÃ¢u há»i, bao gá»“m `type`, `points`, `order` trong bÃ i thi, vÃ  `metadata` JSON cho cÃ¡c cáº¥u hÃ¬nh Ä‘áº·c thÃ¹ cá»§a loáº¡i cÃ¢u há»i.
    *   Model `Option` lÆ°u cÃ¡c lá»±a chá»n hoáº·c Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n máº«u, liÃªn káº¿t vá»›i `Question`.
  - **Chi tiáº¿t triá»ƒn khai:** Quan há»‡ má»™t-nhiá»u giá»¯a `Quiz` vÃ  `Question`, vÃ  má»™t-nhiá»u giá»¯a `Question` vÃ  `Option` Ä‘Æ°á»£c Ä‘á»‹nh nghÄ©a rÃµ rÃ ng trong `schema.prisma`.

- **Quáº£n lÃ½ Lá»›p há»c:**
  - **Thá»±c táº¿ EduAsses:**
    *   **Táº¡o lá»›p (`Class` model):** GiÃ¡o viÃªn táº¡o lá»›p vá»›i `name`, `description`, `subject`, `type` (`PUBLIC` hoáº·c `PRIVATE`), vÃ  `code` (mÃ£ tham gia cho lá»›p PRIVATE).

  - **Chi tiáº¿t giao diá»‡n:** Giao diá»‡n quáº£n lÃ½ lá»›p há»c (`app/dashboard/teacher/classes`) cho phÃ©p giÃ¡o viÃªn xem danh sÃ¡ch há»c sinh, cÃ¡c bÃ i kiá»ƒm tra Ä‘Ã£ giao, vÃ  gá»­i thÃ´ng bÃ¡o (`ClassAnnouncement`).

### 3.6. Limitations and Future Enhancements (Giá»›i háº¡n vÃ  HÆ°á»›ng PhÃ¡t triá»ƒn TÆ°Æ¡ng lai)

- **Giá»›i háº¡n Hiá»‡n táº¡i:**

  - **Mobile App:** Chá»‰ cÃ³ giao diá»‡n web responsive, chÆ°a cÃ³ á»©ng dá»¥ng di Ä‘á»™ng native chuyÃªn biá»‡t.

- **Kháº£ nÄƒng Má»Ÿ rá»™ng Há»‡ thá»‘ng vÃ  CÃ¡c TÃ­nh nÄƒng TÆ°Æ¡ng lai:**
  - **Cháº¥m Ä‘iá»ƒm báº±ng AI cho Essay:** TÃ­ch há»£p cÃ¡c mÃ´ hÃ¬nh NLP/AI Ä‘á»ƒ Ä‘Æ°a ra gá»£i Ã½ Ä‘iá»ƒm hoáº·c tá»± Ä‘á»™ng cháº¥m sÆ¡ bá»™ cÃ¢u há»i tá»± luáº­n.
  - **Mobile App:** PhÃ¡t triá»ƒn á»©ng dá»¥ng native cho iOS vÃ  Android Ä‘á»ƒ cáº£i thiá»‡n tráº£i nghiá»‡m ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng di Ä‘á»™ng vÃ  cÃ³ thá»ƒ há»— trá»£ tÃ­nh nÄƒng offline.
  - **Camera-based Proctoring:** TÃ­ch há»£p giáº£i phÃ¡p giÃ¡m sÃ¡t qua webcam, cÃ³ thá»ƒ sá»­ dá»¥ng AI Ä‘á»ƒ phÃ¡t hiá»‡n hÃ nh vi Ä‘Ã¡ng ngá».
  - **Advanced Learning Analytics & Adaptive Learning:** Sá»­ dá»¥ng machine learning Ä‘á»ƒ phÃ¢n tÃ­ch sÃ¢u hÆ¡n hÃ nh vi há»c táº­p, Ä‘Æ°a ra cÃ¡c lá»™ trÃ¬nh há»c táº­p cÃ¡ nhÃ¢n hÃ³a vÃ  gá»£i Ã½ ná»™i dung phÃ¹ há»£p.
  - **Gamification:** ThÃªm cÃ¡c yáº¿u tá»‘ trÃ² chÆ¡i hÃ³a (Ä‘iá»ƒm thÆ°á»Ÿng, huy hiá»‡u, báº£ng xáº¿p háº¡ng) Ä‘á»ƒ tÄƒng Ä‘á»™ng lá»±c cho há»c sinh.
  - **Há»— trá»£ Cá»™ng tÃ¡c:** TÃ­nh nÄƒng cho phÃ©p giÃ¡o viÃªn cÃ¹ng nhau soáº¡n tháº£o Ä‘á» thi hoáº·c chia sáº» ngÃ¢n hÃ ng cÃ¢u há»i.

Hy vá»ng pháº§n phÃ¢n tÃ­ch chi tiáº¿t nÃ y giÃºp báº¡n lÃ m rÃµ hÆ¡n cÃ¡c tÃ­nh nÄƒng Ä‘Ã£ triá»ƒn khai trong EduAsses cho Chapter Implementation!

### 3.6.1 Current System Limitations

Dá»±a trÃªn code thá»±c táº¿ trong dá»± Ã¡n, tÃ´i sáº½ trÃ¬nh bÃ y chÃ­nh xÃ¡c vá» thuáº­t toÃ¡n xá»­ lÃ½ cho cÃ¡c loáº¡i cÃ¢u há»i MCQ, True/False, Short Answer vÃ  Matching:

## Thuáº­t toÃ¡n xá»­ lÃ½ cÃ¢u há»i trong EduAsses

### 1. Multiple Choice vÃ  True/False Questions

Code thá»±c táº¿ cho thuáº­t toÃ¡n cháº¥m Ä‘iá»ƒm MCQ vÃ  True/False:

```typescript
function gradeMultipleChoiceQuestion(question: Question, answer: Answer): GradingResult {
  const metadata = getMultipleChoiceMetadata(question);
  
  // XÃ¡c Ä‘á»‹nh cho phÃ©p chá»n nhiá»u Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n hay khÃ´ng
  let allowMultiple = metadata.allowMultiple;
  
  // Kiá»ƒm tra thÃªm trÆ°á»ng allowMultipleAnswers tá»« metadata
  if (!allowMultiple && question.metadata) {
    if (typeof question.metadata === 'object' && 'allowMultipleAnswers' in question.metadata) {
      allowMultiple = Boolean(question.metadata.allowMultipleAnswers);
    }
  }
  
  const questionPoints = question.points || 1;
  
  // Kiá»ƒm tra cÃ¢u há»i cÃ³ options khÃ´ng
  if (!question.options || question.options.length === 0) {
    return {
      isCorrect: false,
      score: 0,
      needsManualGrading: true,
      feedback: "Question has no options defined"
    };
  }
  
  // Láº¥y danh sÃ¡ch cÃ¡c ID cá»§a option Ä‘Ãºng
  const correctOptionIds = question.options
    .filter(option => option.isCorrect)
    .map(option => option.id);
  
  // Kiá»ƒm tra cÃ¢u há»i cÃ³ Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n Ä‘Ãºng khÃ´ng
  if (correctOptionIds.length === 0) {
    return {
      isCorrect: false,
      score: 0,
      needsManualGrading: true,
      feedback: "Question has no correct options defined"
    };
  }
  
  // Láº¥y cÃ¡c options mÃ  ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng Ä‘Ã£ chá»n
  const selectedOptionIds = answer.selectedOptions || [];
  
  // Sá»­ dá»¥ng hÃ m tÃ¡ch riÃªng Ä‘á»ƒ cháº¥m Ä‘iá»ƒm
  const result = gradeMultipleChoiceAnswer(
    selectedOptionIds,
    correctOptionIds,
    questionPoints,
    allowMultiple,
    metadata.allowPartialCredit !== false,
    question.options.length
  );
  
  // Chuyá»ƒn Ä‘á»•i káº¿t quáº£ vá» Ä‘á»‹nh dáº¡ng GradingResult
  return {
    isCorrect: result.isCorrect === null ? false : result.isCorrect,
    score: result.score === null ? 0 : result.score,
    needsManualGrading: false,
    feedback: result.feedback || undefined
  };
}
```

Logic chi tiáº¿t náº±m trong hÃ m `gradeMultipleChoiceAnswer`:

```typescript
export function gradeMultipleChoiceAnswer(
  selectedOptions: string[],
  correctOptions: string[],
  maxPoints: number,
  allowMultiple: boolean = false,
  allowPartialCredit: boolean = true,
  totalOptionsCount: number = 0
): SimpleGradingResult {
  // Xá»­ lÃ½ trÆ°á»ng há»£p khÃ´ng chá»n Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n
  if (selectedOptions.length === 0) {
    return {
      isCorrect: false,
      score: 0,
      feedback: "No answer selected"
    };
  }

  // Xá»­ lÃ½ cho cÃ¢u há»i chá»n má»™t Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n (MCQ truyá»n thá»‘ng)
  if (!allowMultiple) {
    // Náº¿u chá»n nhiá»u Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n cho cÃ¢u há»i chá»‰ chá»n má»™t
    if (selectedOptions.length > 1) {
      return {
        isCorrect: false,
        score: 0,
        feedback: "Multiple options selected for a single-choice question"
      };
    }

    // Kiá»ƒm tra Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n Ä‘Æ°á»£c chá»n cÃ³ Ä‘Ãºng khÃ´ng
    const isCorrect = correctOptions.includes(selectedOptions[0]);
    return {
      isCorrect,
      score: isCorrect ? maxPoints : 0,
      feedback: isCorrect ? "Correct answer" : "Incorrect answer"
    };
  }
  
  // Xá»­ lÃ½ cho cÃ¢u há»i chá»n nhiá»u Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n
  // Äáº¿m sá»‘ Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n Ä‘Ãºng Ä‘Æ°á»£c chá»n vÃ  sá»‘ Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n sai Ä‘Æ°á»£c chá»n
  const selectedCorrectCount = selectedOptions.filter(id => 
    correctOptions.includes(id)
  ).length;
  
  const selectedIncorrectCount = selectedOptions.filter(id => 
    !correctOptions.includes(id)
  ).length;
  
  // Kiá»ƒm tra chá»n táº¥t cáº£ cÃ¡c Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n Ä‘Ãºng vÃ  khÃ´ng chá»n Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n sai nÃ o
  const allCorrectSelected = selectedCorrectCount === correctOptions.length;
  const noIncorrectSelected = selectedIncorrectCount === 0;
  
  // CÃ¢u tráº£ lá»i hoÃ n háº£o
  if (allCorrectSelected && noIncorrectSelected) {
    return {
      isCorrect: true,
      score: maxPoints,
      feedback: "All correct options selected"
    };
  }
  
  // Xá»­ lÃ½ cho phÃ©p tÃ­nh Ä‘iá»ƒm má»™t pháº§n
  if (allowPartialCredit) {
    // Tá»•ng sá»‘ Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n (Ä‘Ãºng + sai) Ä‘Æ°á»£c chá»n
    const totalSelected = selectedCorrectCount + selectedIncorrectCount;
    
    // Tá»· lá»‡ Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n Ä‘Ãºng trÃªn tá»•ng sá»‘ Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n Ä‘Ãºng cÃ³ thá»ƒ chá»n
    let proportion = selectedCorrectCount / correctOptions.length;
    
    // Trá»« Ä‘iá»ƒm náº¿u chá»n cÃ¡c Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n sai
    if (selectedIncorrectCount > 0) {
      // Pháº¡t dá»±a trÃªn tá»· lá»‡ sá»‘ Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n sai Ä‘Æ°á»£c chá»n
      const penaltyFactor = selectedIncorrectCount / 
                          (totalOptionsCount - correctOptions.length);
      proportion = Math.max(0, proportion - penaltyFactor);
    }
    
    const score = Math.round(maxPoints * proportion);
    
    return {
      isCorrect: proportion > 0.99, // LÃ m trÃ²n Ä‘á»ƒ trÃ¡nh váº¥n Ä‘á» vá» sá»‘ tháº­p phÃ¢n
      score,
      feedback: `${selectedCorrectCount}/${correctOptions.length} correct options selected, 
                ${selectedIncorrectCount} incorrect options selected`
    };
  }
  
  // TrÆ°á»ng há»£p khÃ´ng cho phÃ©p tÃ­nh Ä‘iá»ƒm má»™t pháº§n
  return {
    isCorrect: false,
    score: 0,
    feedback: "Partially correct. All correct options must be selected with no incorrect options for credit."
  };
}
```

### 2. Short Answer Questions

```typescript
function gradeShortAnswerQuestion(question: Question, answer: Answer): GradingResult {
  // Kiá»ƒm tra cÃ³ nháº­p cÃ¢u tráº£ lá»i khÃ´ng
  if (!answer.textAnswer) {
    return {
      isCorrect: false,
      score: 0,
      needsManualGrading: false
    };
  }
  
  const questionPoints = question.points || 1;
  const metadata = getShortAnswerMetadata(question);
  const caseSensitive = metadata.caseSensitive;
  
  // Láº¥y táº¥t cáº£ Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n Ä‘Ãºng tá»« options
  const correctOptions = question.options?.filter(option => option.isCorrect) || [];
  
  if (correctOptions.length === 0) {
    return {
      isCorrect: false,
      score: 0,
      needsManualGrading: true,
      feedback: "Question has no correct answers defined"
    };
  }
  
  // Chuáº©n hÃ³a Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n dá»±a trÃªn cáº¥u hÃ¬nh phÃ¢n biá»‡t chá»¯ hoa/thÆ°á»ng
  const normalizeAnswer = (text: string) => 
    caseSensitive ? text.trim() : text.trim().toLowerCase();
  
  const userAnswer = normalizeAnswer(answer.textAnswer);
  
  // Kiá»ƒm tra náº¿u báº¥t ká»³ Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n Ä‘Ãºng nÃ o khá»›p vá»›i Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n cá»§a ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng
  const isCorrect = correctOptions.some(option => {
    const correctAnswer = normalizeAnswer(option.content);
    return userAnswer === correctAnswer;
  });
  
  return {
    isCorrect,
    score: isCorrect ? questionPoints : 0,
    needsManualGrading: false
  };
}
```

### 3. Matching Questions

```typescript
export function gradeMatchingQuestion(question: Question, answer: Answer): GradingResult {
  const questionPoints = question.points || 1;

  // NhÃ³m cÃ¡c options - há»— trá»£ cáº£ premise/response vÃ  legacy left/right
  const premiseOptions = question.options?.filter(opt => opt.group === 'premise' || opt.group === 'left') || [];
  const responseOptions = question.options?.filter(opt => opt.group === 'response' || opt.group === 'right') || [];

  if (premiseOptions.length === 0 || responseOptions.length === 0) {
    return {
      isCorrect: false,
      score: 0,
      needsManualGrading: true,
      feedback: "Question has no premise or response options defined"
    };
  }

  // Láº¥y cÃ¡c cáº·p ghÃ©p Ä‘Ãºng tá»« options
  const correctMatches: Record<string, string> = {};
  for (const premiseOption of premiseOptions) {
    if (premiseOption.id && typeof premiseOption.id === 'string' && 
        premiseOption.matchId && typeof premiseOption.matchId === 'string') {
      // TÃ¬m response option tÆ°Æ¡ng á»©ng vá»›i premise nÃ y
      const matchingResponse = responseOptions.find(
        response => response.id === premiseOption.matchId
      );
      if (matchingResponse && matchingResponse.id && typeof matchingResponse.id === 'string') {
        correctMatches[premiseOption.id] = matchingResponse.id;
      }
    }
  }

  // Náº¿u khÃ´ng cÃ³ cáº·p ghÃ©p Ä‘Ãºng nÃ o Ä‘Æ°á»£c Ä‘á»‹nh nghÄ©a
  if (Object.keys(correctMatches).length === 0) {
    return {
      isCorrect: false,
      score: 0,
      needsManualGrading: true,
      feedback: "No correct matches defined for this question. Please check question setup."
    };
  }

  // Xá»­ lÃ½ dá»¯ liá»‡u cÃ¢u tráº£ lá»i tá»« student
  let userAnswers: Record<string, string> = {};
  if (answer.jsonData && typeof answer.jsonData === 'string') {
    try {
      const parsedData = JSON.parse(answer.jsonData);
      if (typeof parsedData === 'object' && parsedData !== null) {
        // XÃ¢y dá»±ng userAnswers má»™t cÃ¡ch an toÃ n
        const tempUserAnswers: Record<string, string> = {};
        let allValuesAreStrings = true;
        for (const key in parsedData) {
          if (Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(parsedData, key)) {
            if (typeof parsedData[key] === 'string') {
              tempUserAnswers[key] = parsedData[key];
            } else {
              allValuesAreStrings = false;
              break;
            }
          }
        }
        if (allValuesAreStrings) {
          userAnswers = tempUserAnswers;
        } else {
          return {
            isCorrect: false,
            score: 0,
            needsManualGrading: false,
            feedback: "Invalid answer data format (some values are not strings)."
          };
        }
      } else {
        // jsonData Ä‘Ã£ parse nhÆ°ng khÃ´ng pháº£i lÃ  object
        return {
            isCorrect: false,
            score: 0,
            needsManualGrading: false, 
            feedback: "Invalid answer data format (not an object)."
        };
      }
    } catch (e) {
      console.error("Error parsing jsonData in matching question:", e);
      return {
        isCorrect: false,
        score: 0,
        needsManualGrading: false, 
        feedback: "Invalid answer data format (JSON parse failed)."
      };
    }
  } else {
    // KhÃ´ng cÃ³ jsonData hoáº·c nÃ³ khÃ´ng pháº£i lÃ  string
    return {
        isCorrect: false,
        score: 0,
        needsManualGrading: false,
        feedback: "No valid answer data provided."
    };
  }
  
  // Äáº¿m sá»‘ cáº·p ghÃ©p Ä‘Ãºng
  let correctUserMatchCount = 0;
  // Láº·p qua cÃ¡c cáº·p ghÃ©p Ä‘Ãºng Ä‘Ã£ Ä‘Æ°á»£c Ä‘á»‹nh nghÄ©a
  for (const [definedPremiseId, definedResponseId] of Object.entries(correctMatches)) {
    // Kiá»ƒm tra xem cÃ¢u tráº£ lá»i cho premise nÃ y cÃ³ khá»›p vá»›i Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n Ä‘Ãºng khÃ´ng
    if (userAnswers[definedPremiseId] === definedResponseId) {
      correctUserMatchCount++;
    }
  }
  
  const totalPossibleCorrectMatches = Object.keys(correctMatches).length;
  
  // TÃ­nh Ä‘iá»ƒm dá»±a trÃªn tá»· lá»‡ sá»‘ cáº·p ghÃ©p Ä‘Ãºng
  const proportion = totalPossibleCorrectMatches > 0 
                   ? correctUserMatchCount / totalPossibleCorrectMatches 
                   : 0;
  const score = Math.round(questionPoints * proportion);
  const isCorrect = correctUserMatchCount === totalPossibleCorrectMatches;
  
  return {
    isCorrect,
    score,
    needsManualGrading: false,
    feedback: isCorrect ? "All matches correct." : `${correctUserMatchCount}/${totalPossibleCorrectMatches} correct matches`
  };
}
```

## TÃ³m táº¯t thuáº­t toÃ¡n cháº¥m Ä‘iá»ƒm dá»±a trÃªn code thá»±c táº¿:

### MCQ vÃ  True/False:
- **Äá»‘i vá»›i cÃ¢u há»i chá»n má»™t Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n (allowMultiple = false)**:
  - Náº¿u ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng chá»n Ä‘Ãºng Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n duy nháº¥t, Ä‘Æ°á»£c toÃ n bá»™ Ä‘iá»ƒm
  - Náº¿u ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng chá»n sai Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n hoáº·c chá»n nhiá»u Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n, Ä‘Æ°á»£c 0 Ä‘iá»ƒm

- **Äá»‘i vá»›i cÃ¢u há»i chá»n nhiá»u Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n (allowMultiple = true)**:
  - Náº¿u chá»n táº¥t cáº£ Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n Ä‘Ãºng vÃ  khÃ´ng chá»n Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n sai nÃ o, Ä‘Æ°á»£c toÃ n bá»™ Ä‘iá»ƒm
  - Náº¿u cho phÃ©p tÃ­nh Ä‘iá»ƒm má»™t pháº§n (allowPartialCredit = true):
    - Äiá»ƒm Ä‘Æ°á»£c tÃ­nh dá»±a trÃªn tá»· lá»‡ sá»‘ Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n Ä‘Ãºng Ä‘Æ°á»£c chá»n
    - Bá»‹ trá»« Ä‘iá»ƒm náº¿u chá»n cÃ¡c Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n sai
  - Náº¿u khÃ´ng cho phÃ©p tÃ­nh Ä‘iá»ƒm má»™t pháº§n, chá»‰ Ä‘Æ°á»£c Ä‘iá»ƒm khi chá»n táº¥t cáº£ Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n Ä‘Ãºng vÃ  khÃ´ng chá»n Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n sai

### Short Answer (CÃ¢u tráº£ lá»i ngáº¯n):
- CÃ¢u tráº£ lá»i cá»§a ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng Ä‘Æ°á»£c chuáº©n hÃ³a (bá» khoáº£ng tráº¯ng thá»«a vÃ  chuyá»ƒn vá» chá»¯ thÆ°á»ng náº¿u khÃ´ng phÃ¢n biá»‡t hoa/thÆ°á»ng)
- CÃ¢u tráº£ lá»i Ä‘Æ°á»£c so khá»›p chÃ­nh xÃ¡c vá»›i cÃ¡c Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n Ä‘Ãºng Ä‘Ã£ Ä‘á»‹nh nghÄ©a
- Náº¿u khá»›p vá»›i má»™t trong cÃ¡c Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n Ä‘Ãºng, Ä‘Æ°á»£c toÃ n bá»™ Ä‘iá»ƒm
- Náº¿u khÃ´ng khá»›p vá»›i báº¥t ká»³ Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n Ä‘Ãºng nÃ o, Ä‘Æ°á»£c 0 Ä‘iá»ƒm

### Matching (GhÃ©p Ä‘Ã´i):
- CÃ¡c options Ä‘Æ°á»£c phÃ¢n loáº¡i thÃ nh hai nhÃ³m: premise/left vÃ  response/right
- Tá»« options, xÃ¢y dá»±ng má»™t map chá»©a cÃ¡c cáº·p ghÃ©p Ä‘Ãºng: `{ premiseId: responseId }`
- CÃ¢u tráº£ lá»i cá»§a ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng Ä‘Æ°á»£c lÆ°u dÆ°á»›i dáº¡ng JSON string trong `answer.jsonData`
- Sau khi parse JSON, cÅ©ng thu Ä‘Æ°á»£c má»™t map tá»« premiseId Ä‘áº¿n responseId mÃ  ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng Ä‘Ã£ chá»n
- So sÃ¡nh tá»«ng cáº·p mÃ  ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng chá»n vá»›i cÃ¡c cáº·p Ä‘Ãºng Ä‘Ã£ Ä‘á»‹nh nghÄ©a
- Äiá»ƒm sá»‘ Ä‘Æ°á»£c tÃ­nh dá»±a trÃªn tá»· lá»‡ sá»‘ cáº·p ghÃ©p Ä‘Ãºng
  - VÃ­ dá»¥: náº¿u cÃ³ 5 cáº·p, chá»n Ä‘Ãºng 3 cáº·p thÃ¬ Ä‘Æ°á»£c 3/5 sá»‘ Ä‘iá»ƒm cá»§a cÃ¢u há»i
- CÆ¡ cháº¿ nÃ y cho phÃ©p tÃ­nh Ä‘iá»ƒm má»™t pháº§n cho má»—i cáº·p ghÃ©p Ä‘Ãºng

CÃ¡c thuáº­t toÃ¡n nÃ y Ä‘Æ°á»£c thiáº¿t káº¿ Ä‘á»ƒ xá»­ lÃ½ linh hoáº¡t dá»¯ liá»‡u Ä‘áº§u vÃ o, bao gá»“m cáº£ viá»‡c kiá»ƒm tra lá»—i, xá»­ lÃ½ dá»¯ liá»‡u khÃ´ng há»£p lá»‡, vÃ  cung cáº¥p pháº£n há»“i há»¯u Ã­ch cho ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng.

---

_**User**_

Ä‘Æ°á»£c rá»“i giá» hÃ£y hoÃ n thiá»‡n láº¡i tiá»ƒu má»¥c Grading Algorithm Implementation

---

_**Assistant**_



---

Tuyá»‡t vá»i! Dá»±a trÃªn nhá»¯ng phÃ¢n tÃ­ch chi tiáº¿t vá» mÃ£ nguá»“n `lib/answer-grading.ts` vÃ  cÃ¡c tá»‡p liÃªn quan, chÃºng ta sáº½ hoÃ n thiá»‡n láº¡i tiá»ƒu má»¥c "Grading Algorithm Implementation".

DÆ°á»›i Ä‘Ã¢y lÃ  ná»™i dung chi tiáº¿t, chÃ­nh xÃ¡c tá»« dá»± Ã¡n EduAsses:

### 3.4.1 Grading Algorithm Implementation (Triá»ƒn khai Thuáº­t toÃ¡n Cháº¥m Ä‘iá»ƒm)

Há»‡ thá»‘ng EduAsses triá»ƒn khai má»™t cÆ¡ cháº¿ cháº¥m Ä‘iá»ƒm tá»± Ä‘á»™ng tinh vi, Ä‘Æ°á»£c quáº£n lÃ½ chá»§ yáº¿u bá»Ÿi module `lib/answer-grading.ts`. Module nÃ y chá»©a cÃ¡c hÃ m chuyÃªn biá»‡t Ä‘á»ƒ Ä‘Ã¡nh giÃ¡ cÃ¢u tráº£ lá»i cho tá»«ng loáº¡i cÃ¢u há»i, Ä‘áº£m báº£o tÃ­nh chÃ­nh xÃ¡c vÃ  cung cáº¥p pháº£n há»“i ká»‹p thá»i cho ngÆ°á»i há»c. Viá»‡c cháº¥m Ä‘iá»ƒm dá»±a trÃªn cáº¥u trÃºc cá»§a Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng `Question` vÃ  `Answer` Ä‘Æ°á»£c Ä‘á»‹nh nghÄ©a trong `lib/question-utils.ts`.

**a. Multiple Choice Questions (MCQ) & True/False Questions (CÃ¢u há»i Tráº¯c nghiá»‡m & ÄÃºng/Sai)**

Viá»‡c cháº¥m Ä‘iá»ƒm cho hai loáº¡i cÃ¢u há»i nÃ y Ä‘Æ°á»£c thá»±c hiá»‡n bá»Ÿi hÃ m `gradeMultipleChoiceQuestion`, hÃ m nÃ y gá»i hÃ m ná»™i bá»™ `gradeMultipleChoiceAnswer` Ä‘á»ƒ xá»­ lÃ½ logic cá»‘t lÃµi.

*   **Äáº§u vÃ o (Inputs):**
    *   `question: Question`: Äá»‘i tÆ°á»£ng cÃ¢u há»i chá»©a `id`, `points` (Ä‘iá»ƒm cho cÃ¢u há»i, máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  1), `options` (danh sÃ¡ch cÃ¡c lá»±a chá»n) vÃ  `metadata`.
    *   `question.options: Option[]`: Má»—i `Option` cÃ³ `id`, `content` (ná»™i dung lá»±a chá»n), vÃ  cá» `isCorrect` (boolean).
    *   `question.metadata`: ÄÆ°á»£c láº¥y thÃ´ng qua `getMultipleChoiceMetadata(question)`, chá»©a cÃ¡c thuá»™c tÃ­nh quan trá»ng nhÆ° `allowMultiple` (boolean, cho phÃ©p chá»n nhiá»u Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n, cÃ³ xá»­ lÃ½ tÆ°Æ¡ng thÃ­ch ngÆ°á»£c vá»›i `allowMultipleAnswers`), vÃ  `allowPartialCredit` (boolean, cho phÃ©p tÃ­nh Ä‘iá»ƒm má»™t pháº§n, máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  `true`).
    *   `answer: Answer`: Äá»‘i tÆ°á»£ng cÃ¢u tráº£ lá»i chá»©a `selectedOptions: string[]` (máº£ng cÃ¡c `id` cá»§a lá»±a chá»n mÃ  há»c sinh Ä‘Ã£ chá»n).

*   **Logic Cháº¥m Ä‘iá»ƒm Cá»‘t lÃµi (trong `gradeMultipleChoiceAnswer`):**
    1.  **Kiá»ƒm tra Äiá»u kiá»‡n Ban Ä‘áº§u:**
        *   Náº¿u cÃ¢u há»i khÃ´ng cÃ³ `options` hoáº·c khÃ´ng cÃ³ `option` nÃ o Ä‘Æ°á»£c Ä‘Ã¡nh dáº¥u lÃ  `isCorrect`, hÃ m sáº½ tráº£ vá» káº¿t quáº£ cáº§n cháº¥m thá»§ cÃ´ng vá»›i `feedback` tÆ°Æ¡ng á»©ng.
        *   Náº¿u há»c sinh khÃ´ng chá»n `selectedOptions` nÃ o, tráº£ vá» `isCorrect: false`, `score: 0`.
    2.  **Xá»­ lÃ½ CÃ¢u há»i Chá»n Má»™t ÄÃ¡p Ã¡n (`allowMultiple = false`):**
        *   Náº¿u há»c sinh chá»n nhiá»u hÆ¡n má»™t Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n, tráº£ vá» `isCorrect: false`, `score: 0`.
        *   Náº¿u há»c sinh chá»n má»™t Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n duy nháº¥t vÃ  Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n Ä‘Ã³ náº±m trong danh sÃ¡ch `correctOptionIds` (cÃ¡c `id` cá»§a `Option` cÃ³ `isCorrect = true`), thÃ¬ `isCorrect = true` vÃ  `score = question.points`. NgÆ°á»£c láº¡i, `isCorrect = false`, `score = 0`.
    3.  **Xá»­ lÃ½ CÃ¢u há»i Chá»n Nhiá»u ÄÃ¡p Ã¡n (`allowMultiple = true`):**
        *   Äáº¿m sá»‘ lá»±a chá»n Ä‘Ãºng mÃ  há»c sinh Ä‘Ã£ chá»n (`selectedCorrectCount`) vÃ  sá»‘ lá»±a chá»n sai mÃ  há»c sinh Ä‘Ã£ chá»n (`selectedIncorrectCount`).
        *   **TrÆ°á»ng há»£p HoÃ n háº£o:** Náº¿u `selectedCorrectCount` báº±ng tá»•ng sá»‘ Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n Ä‘Ãºng (`correctOptions.length`) VÃ€ `selectedIncorrectCount` báº±ng 0, thÃ¬ `isCorrect = true`, `score = question.points`.
        *   **TÃ­nh Äiá»ƒm Má»™t Pháº§n (`allowPartialCredit = true`):**
            *   Äiá»ƒm ban Ä‘áº§u Ä‘Æ°á»£c tÃ­nh báº±ng tá»· lá»‡ `(selectedCorrectCount / correctOptions.length) * question.points`.
            *   Náº¿u `selectedIncorrectCount > 0` vÃ  tá»•ng sá»‘ lá»±a chá»n cá»§a cÃ¢u há»i (`totalOptionsCount`) lá»›n hÆ¡n 0, má»™t khoáº£n Ä‘iá»ƒm pháº¡t sáº½ Ä‘Æ°á»£c Ã¡p dá»¥ng. Äiá»ƒm pháº¡t nÃ y Ä‘Æ°á»£c tÃ­nh báº±ng `(selectedIncorrectCount / totalOptionsCount) * question.points`. Äiá»ƒm cuá»‘i cÃ¹ng lÃ  `partialScore` sau khi trá»« Ä‘iá»ƒm pháº¡t (nhÆ°ng khÃ´ng tháº¥p hÆ¡n 0).
            *   `isCorrect` sáº½ lÃ  `false` trong trÆ°á»ng há»£p nÃ y (vÃ¬ khÃ´ng pháº£i lÃ  cÃ¢u tráº£ lá»i hoÃ n háº£o).
        *   **KhÃ´ng TÃ­nh Äiá»ƒm Má»™t Pháº§n (`allowPartialCredit = false`):** Náº¿u cÃ¢u tráº£ lá»i khÃ´ng hoÃ n háº£o, `isCorrect = false`, `score = 0`.
    4.  **Äáº§u ra (Output):** HÃ m `gradeMultipleChoiceQuestion` tráº£ vá» má»™t Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng `GradingResult` bao gá»“m `isCorrect: boolean`, `score: number`, `needsManualGrading: false`, vÃ  `feedback?: string`.

> *[HÃ¬nh áº£nh giao diá»‡n: CÃ³ thá»ƒ hiá»ƒn thá»‹ mÃ n hÃ¬nh giÃ¡o viÃªn cáº¥u hÃ¬nh má»™t cÃ¢u MCQ vá»›i cÃ¡c tÃ¹y chá»n `allowMultiple` vÃ  `allowPartialCredit`, vÃ  mÃ n hÃ¬nh káº¿t quáº£ cá»§a há»c sinh hiá»ƒn thá»‹ Ä‘iá»ƒm nháº­n Ä‘Æ°á»£c cÃ¹ng pháº£n há»“i.]*

**b. Short Answer Questions (CÃ¢u há»i Tráº£ lá»i Ngáº¯n)**

Viá»‡c cháº¥m Ä‘iá»ƒm Ä‘Æ°á»£c xá»­ lÃ½ bá»Ÿi hÃ m `gradeShortAnswerQuestion`.

*   **Äáº§u vÃ o (Inputs):**
    *   `question: Question`: TÆ°Æ¡ng tá»± nhÆ° MCQ, nhÆ°ng `metadata` Ä‘Æ°á»£c láº¥y qua `getShortAnswerMetadata(question)` chá»©a cá» `caseSensitive` (boolean, máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh lÃ  `false`). CÃ¡c `Option` cÃ³ `isCorrect = true` chá»©a cÃ¡c ná»™i dung Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n máº«u.
    *   `answer: Answer`: Chá»©a `textAnswer: string` (cÃ¢u tráº£ lá»i dáº¡ng vÄƒn báº£n cá»§a há»c sinh).

*   **Logic Cháº¥m Ä‘iá»ƒm Cá»‘t lÃµi:**
    1.  **Kiá»ƒm tra Äiá»u kiá»‡n Ban Ä‘áº§u:**
        *   Náº¿u `answer.textAnswer` khÃ´ng tá»“n táº¡i (rá»—ng hoáº·c null), tráº£ vá» `isCorrect: false`, `score: 0`.
        *   Náº¿u cÃ¢u há»i khÃ´ng cÃ³ `options` nÃ o Ä‘Æ°á»£c Ä‘Ã¡nh dáº¥u lÃ  `isCorrect`, tráº£ vá» káº¿t quáº£ cáº§n cháº¥m thá»§ cÃ´ng.
    2.  **Chuáº©n hÃ³a ÄÃ¡p Ã¡n:** Cáº£ `answer.textAnswer` cá»§a há»c sinh vÃ  `option.content` cá»§a cÃ¡c Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n Ä‘Ãºng Ä‘á»u Ä‘Æ°á»£c chuáº©n hÃ³a báº±ng cÃ¡ch `trim()` (loáº¡i bá» khoáº£ng tráº¯ng thá»«a). Náº¿u `caseSensitive = false`, cáº£ hai sáº½ Ä‘Æ°á»£c chuyá»ƒn thÃ nh chá»¯ thÆ°á»ng (`toLowerCase()`) trÆ°á»›c khi so sÃ¡nh.
    3.  **So khá»›p:** CÃ¢u tráº£ lá»i Ä‘Ã£ chuáº©n hÃ³a cá»§a há»c sinh Ä‘Æ°á»£c so sÃ¡nh vá»›i tá»«ng Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n Ä‘Ãºng Ä‘Ã£ chuáº©n hÃ³a.
    4.  **XÃ¡c Ä‘á»‹nh TÃ­nh Ä‘Ãºng Ä‘áº¯n:** Náº¿u `userAnswer` khá»›p chÃ­nh xÃ¡c vá»›i báº¥t ká»³ `correctAnswer` nÃ o tá»« `correctOptions`, thÃ¬ `isCorrect = true` vÃ  `score = question.points`. NgÆ°á»£c láº¡i, `isCorrect = false` vÃ  `score = 0`.
    5.  **Äáº§u ra (Output):** Tráº£ vá» `GradingResult` vá»›i `needsManualGrading: false`.

> *[Minh há»a: Báº£ng mÃ´ táº£ vÃ­ dá»¥ vá»›i `textAnswer` cá»§a há»c sinh, `option.content` cá»§a Ä‘Ã¡p Ã¡n Ä‘Ãºng, giÃ¡ trá»‹ cá» `caseSensitive`, vÃ  káº¿t quáº£ `isCorrect`, `score` tÆ°Æ¡ng á»©ng.]*

**c. Matching Questions (CÃ¢u há»i GhÃ©p ÄÃ´i)**

Viá»‡c cháº¥m Ä‘iá»ƒm Ä‘Æ°á»£c xá»­ lÃ½ bá»Ÿi hÃ m `export function gradeMatchingQuestion`.

*   **Äáº§u vÃ o (Inputs):**
    *   `question: Question`: `options` Ä‘Æ°á»£c sá»­ dá»¥ng Ä‘á»ƒ xÃ¡c Ä‘á»‹nh cÃ¡c cáº·p. Má»—i `Option` cÃ³ `id`, `content`, `group` (string, cÃ³ thá»ƒ lÃ  `'premise'` hoáº·c `'left'` cho má»™t bÃªn vÃ  `'response'` hoáº·c `'right'` cho bÃªn kia), vÃ  `matchId` (string, `id` cá»§a `Option` tÆ°Æ¡ng á»©ng trong nhÃ³m kia Ä‘á»ƒ táº¡o thÃ nh cáº·p Ä‘Ãºng).
    *   `answer: Answer`: Chá»©a `jsonData: string | null`. ÄÃ¢y lÃ  má»™t chuá»—i JSON biá»ƒu diá»…n má»™t Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng (record) map tá»« `id` cá»§a má»™t `premiseOption` sang `id` cá»§a `responseOption` mÃ  há»c sinh Ä‘Ã£ chá»n. VÃ­ dá»¥: `{"premiseId1": "responseIdA", "premiseId2": "responseIdB"}`.

*   **Logic Cháº¥m Ä‘iá»ƒm Cá»‘t lÃµi:**
    1.  **Kiá»ƒm tra Äiá»u kiá»‡n Ban Ä‘áº§u:**
        *   PhÃ¢n loáº¡i cÃ¡c `question.options` thÃ nh `premiseOptions` vÃ  `responseOptions` dá»±a trÃªn trÆ°á»ng `group`. Náº¿u má»™t trong hai nhÃ³m nÃ y rá»—ng, tráº£ vá» káº¿t quáº£ cáº§n cháº¥m thá»§ cÃ´ng.
    2.  **XÃ¢y dá»±ng Danh sÃ¡ch Cáº·p ÄÃºng (`correctMatches`):** Duyá»‡t qua `premiseOptions`. Äá»‘i vá»›i má»—i `premiseOption` cÃ³ `matchId` há»£p lá»‡, tÃ¬m `responseOption` tÆ°Æ¡ng á»©ng. LÆ°u cÃ¡c cáº·p Ä‘Ãºng nÃ y dÆ°á»›i dáº¡ng `Record<string, string>` vá»›i key lÃ  `premiseOption.id` vÃ  value lÃ  `responseOption.id` (tá»©c lÃ  `correctMatches[premiseOption.id] = matchingResponse.id`).
        *   Náº¿u khÃ´ng cÃ³ cáº·p Ä‘Ãºng nÃ o Ä‘Æ°á»£c Ä‘á»‹nh nghÄ©a (`Object.keys(correctMatches).length === 0`), tráº£ vá» káº¿t quáº£ cáº§n cháº¥m thá»§ cÃ´ng.
    3.  **Xá»­ lÃ½ CÃ¢u tráº£ lá»i cá»§a Há»c sinh (`userAnswers`):**
        *   Parse chuá»—i `answer.jsonData`. Náº¿u parse tháº¥t báº¡i, hoáº·c káº¿t quáº£ parse khÃ´ng pháº£i lÃ  má»™t object, hoáº·c object Ä‘Ã³ chá»©a giÃ¡ trá»‹ khÃ´ng pháº£i string, tráº£ vá» `isCorrect: false`, `score: 0` vá»›i `feedback` lá»—i tÆ°Æ¡ng á»©ng.
        *   Náº¿u `answer.jsonData` khÃ´ng cÃ³ hoáº·c khÃ´ng há»£p lá»‡, tráº£ vá» `isCorrect: false`, `score: 0`.
    4.  **Äáº¿m Sá»‘ Cáº·p GhÃ©p ÄÃºng (`correctUserMatchCount`):** Láº·p qua `Object.entries(correctMatches)`. Vá»›i má»—i cáº·p `[definedPremiseId, definedResponseId]` tá»« `correctMatches`, kiá»ƒm tra xem `userAnswers[definedPremiseId]` cÃ³ báº±ng `definedResponseId` hay khÃ´ng.     5.  **TÃ­nh Äiá»ƒm:**
        *   Tá»•ng sá»‘ cáº·p cÃ³ thá»ƒ ghÃ©p Ä‘Ãºng (`totalPossibleCorrectMatches`) lÃ  `Object.keys(correctMatches).length`.
        *   Tá»· lá»‡ Ä‘Ãºng (`proportion`) Ä‘Æ°á»£c tÃ­nh báº±ng `correctUserMatchCount / totalPossibleCorrectMatches` (náº¿u `totalPossibleCorrectMatches > 0`, ngÆ°á»£c láº¡i lÃ  0).

    6.  **Äáº§u ra (Output):** Tráº£ vá» `GradingResult` vá»›i `needsManualGrading: false` vÃ  `feedback` (vÃ­ dá»¥: "All matches correct." hoáº·c "2/5 correct matches").

> *[HÃ¬nh áº£nh giao diá»‡n: MÃ n hÃ¬nh há»c sinh thá»±c hiá»‡n kÃ©o tháº£ Ä‘á»ƒ ghÃ©p cáº·p, vÃ  mÃ n hÃ¬nh káº¿t quáº£ hiá»ƒn thá»‹ cÃ¡c cáº·p ghÃ©p Ä‘Ãºng/sai cÃ¹ng vá»›i Ä‘iá»ƒm sá»‘ Ä‘áº¡t Ä‘Æ°á»£c.]*

**d. Fill-in-the-Blank, Essay, Code, and File Upload Questions**

*   **Essay, Code, File Upload:** Äá»‘i vá»›i cÃ¡c loáº¡i cÃ¢u há»i nÃ y, cÃ¡c hÃ m tÆ°Æ¡ng á»©ng trong `lib/answer-grading.ts` (vÃ­ dá»¥ `gradeCodeQuestion`, hoáº·c trÆ°á»ng há»£p `default` trong `gradeAnswer`) hiá»‡n táº¡i sáº½ tráº£ vá»:
